info.title: DCAT Catalog Management API - Rainbow Provider
info.description: This API provides a comprehensive interface for managing DCAT-AP compliant resources, including catalogs, datasets, data services, and distributions. It allows providers to create, retrieve, update, and delete these resources, as well as manage associated ODRL policies to define access and usage conditions. The API is designed to facilitate interoperability and data exchange within a data space ecosystem.

tags.name: Datasets
tags.description: Endpoints for managing DCAT Datasets within a Catalog.

tags.name: Data Services
tags.description: Endpoints for managing DCAT Data Services within a Catalog.

tags.name: Distributions
tags.description: Endpoints for managing DCAT Distributions for a Dataset.

tags.name: Policies
tags.description: Endpoints for managing ODRL policies for catalog resources.

get.description: Retrieves a summary of all available catalogs from the provider.

post.description: Creates a new catalog. By default, this catalog will not be the main one.

400.description: Bad Request: Malformed JSON or validation error.

post.description: Creates a new catalog and sets it as the main catalog. Any previous main catalog will be updated to a regular catalog.

400.description: Bad Request: Malformed JSON or validation error.

get.description: Retrieves the details of a specific catalog by its unique identifier.

put.description: Updates the details of an existing catalog.

400.description: Bad Request: Invalid ID format or malformed JSON.

delete.description: Deletes a catalog and all its associated resources (datasets, data services, distributions, and policies).

get.description: Retrieves a specific dataset by its unique identifier.
Retrieves all datasets belonging to a specific catalog.

post.summary: Create a dataset in a catalog
post.description: Creates a new dataset within a specified catalog.

400.description: Bad Request: Invalid ID format or malformed JSON.

put.description: Updates the details of an existing dataset within a specific catalog.

400.description: Bad Request: Invalid ID format or malformed JSON.

404.description: Not Found: Catalog or dataset not found.

delete.description: Deletes a dataset and all its associated distributions and policies.

404.description: Not Found: Catalog or dataset not found.

get.summary: Get a data service by ID
get.description: Retrieves a specific data service by its unique identifier.

404.description: Not Found: Data service not found.

get.summary: Get data services by catalog ID
get.description: Retrieves all data services belonging to a specific catalog.

post.summary: Create a data service in a catalog
post.description: Creates a new data service within a specified catalog.

400.description: Bad Request: Invalid ID format or malformed JSON.

put.description: Updates the details of an existing data service within a specific catalog.

parameters.name: did
parameters.description: The ID of the data service.

400.description: Bad Request: Invalid ID format or malformed JSON.

404.description: Not Found: Catalog or data service not found.

delete.description: Deletes a data service and its associated policies.

parameters.name: did
parameters.description: The ID of the data service.

404.description: Not Found: Data service not found.

get.description: Retrieves a specific distribution by its unique identifier.
Retrieves all distributions for a specific dataset.

get.summary: Get distributions by dataset ID and format
get.description: Retrieves all distributions for a specific dataset that match a given DCT format.

parameters.name: dct_format
parameters.description: The DCT format of the distribution.

400.description: Bad Request: Invalid ID or DCT format.

post.description: Creates a new distribution for a specific dataset within a catalog.

400.description: Bad Request: Invalid ID format or malformed JSON.

404.description: Not Found: Catalog or dataset not found.

put.description: Updates an existing distribution for a specific dataset within a catalog.

400.description: Bad Request: Invalid ID format or malformed JSON.

404.description: Not Found: Catalog, dataset, or distribution not found.

delete.description: Deletes a distribution and its associated policies.

404.description: Not Found: Catalog, dataset, or distribution not found.

get.description: Retrieves policy associated with a specific id.

post.summary: Add a policy to a catalog
post.description: Adds a new ODRL policy to a specific catalog.

get.description: Retrieves all policies associated with a specific catalog.

post.summary: Add a policy to a catalog
post.description: Adds a new ODRL policy to a specific catalog.

delete.summary: Remove a policy from a catalog
delete.description: Removes an ODRL policy from a specific catalog.

get.description: Retrieves all policies associated with a specific dataset.

post.summary: Add a policy to a dataset
post.description: Adds a new ODRL policy to a specific dataset.

get.summary: Get policies for a data service
get.description: Retrieves all policies associated with a specific data service.

404.description: Not Found: Data service not found.

post.summary: Add a policy to a data service
post.description: Adds a new ODRL policy to a specific data service.

404.description: Not Found: Data service not found.

delete.summary: Remove a policy from a data service
delete.description: Removes an ODRL policy from a specific data service.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the data service.

404.description: Not Found: Data service not found.

get.description: Retrieves all policies associated with a specific distribution.

post.summary: Add a policy to a distribution
post.description: Adds a new ODRL policy to a specific distribution.

delete.summary: Remove a policy from a distribution
delete.description: Removes an ODRL policy from a specific distribution.

id.name: id
id.description: The unique identifier of the resource.

UuidUrn.description: URN constrained to the uuid namespace.

DctFormats.description: DCAT distribution format based on DSP. (e.g., 'http+push', 'ngsi+pull').

ContextField.description: JSON-LD @context field. Accepts a URI, a context object, or an array mixing both.

allOf.description: DCAT Catalog entity (with JSON-LD fields and Rainbow extensions).
Create a Catalog. Same shape as Catalog minus autogenerated fields (@id, issued, modified).
Edit a Catalog. All fields optional (partial update).
Create a Dataset. Same shape as Dataset minus autogenerated fields (@id, issued, modified).
Edit a Dataset. All fields optional (partial update).
Create a DataService. Same shape as DataService minus autogenerated fields (@id, issued, modified).
Edit a DataService. All fields optional (partial update).
Create a Distribution. Same shape as Distribution minus autogenerated fields (@id, issued, modified). accessService must be a URN.
Edit a Distribution. All fields optional (partial update). accessService must be a URN.

examples: A entity with the provided ID was not found for the given entity.
